text:
The INSTALL document of log4j version 1.0.4 mentions that you can test log4j 
after installing it by executing this:

java org.log4j.test.Hello

This does not work, because log4j is now in org.apache. The line should be:

java org.apache.log4j.test.Hello

The document also mentions the package org.log4j.xml. This should be 
org.apache.log4j.xml.
creator: Jesper.de.Jong@cmg.nl

text: Thanks. I've fixed the bug. Ceki
creator: bugzilla@apache.org
